helpDescription: Set a member's level or level for member's who have a specific role.
helpUsage: Set member to a specified level.```/setlevel user <member> <level>```
Update level for all member who have a specific role.```/setlevel role <member> <level>```
incorrect: Make sure the level you are giving is between 0 and 100.
success: Member %s level has been set to `%s`.
noBot: Unable to set the level of a bot user.
roleSuccess: Levels have been updated for all members with role %s.
